type_hierarchy: Everything that is a entity is also a object

Everything that is a drawdown_case or a participant_person or a drawdown_document or a facility_document or a drawdown_packet or a payment_instruction or a disbursement_notice or a delivery_package or a request_channel or a signature_slot or a resource_token is also a entity
Everything that is a corporate_drawdown_case is also a drawdown_case
Everything that is a borrower_signatory or a bank_drawdown_officer is also a participant_person
Everything that is a delivery_slot_token or a reopen_key_token or a wire_cutoff_window_token or a notice_dispatch_window_token is also a resource_token
